Class MontyHall

  • public class MontyHall
extends java.lang.Object
    Monty Hall Game

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main method that calls the other methods. It calls the welcome method which is the introduction and then the game function then it calls the game function which runs the actual game
        Parameters:
        args -

      • welcome

        public static void welcome()
        This method runs the introduction by printing the instructions as well as the name of the game
        Parameters:
        none -

      • game

        public static void game()
        This is the game method which actually runs the game It starts by picking a random number from 1-3 to be the car door. Then it asks the user to choose a door 1-3. Next it says your pick and then says one of the doors that has a goat in it that was not your pick nor the one with the car in it. this door is found by callling the doorToReveal method. Then the user has the chance to switch and if he/she switches then the user pick is now the switched pick. If this pick is the car number then it will print "You win" but if not it will say that you loose
        Parameters:
        none -

      • doorToReveal

        public static int doorToReveal(int c,
                               int u)
        this method finds the door that is neither the car or the users choices. It picks a random number and if it isn't either the car number or user number then it gets returned but if it is one of them then the number gets randomly picked again
        Parameters:
        u - is the user choice number
        c - is the car number
        Returns:
        goat door
